EmailTemplate.name: 202009_Global_Greenhouse_IMU_Q3_Newsletter_JRD.Q3 HGuide Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: HGuide Highlights: New Customer Support Options, Our HGuide n380 & Integrating Velodyne LiDAR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
{{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
In this edition of HGuide Highlights, we cover our new customer support page, the recently announced HGuide n380, how to synchronize an HGuide n580 with Velodyne LiDAR and information about our upcoming survey/mapping webinar. New Customer Support Page
Getting technical support across any of our HGuide products has never been easier. To access our FAQs or to speak with one of our applications engineers, visit our new HGuide Support page.
Learn More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/hguide-customer-support]]> New HGuide n380 INS/GNSS
We recently introduced the HGuide n380, a new inertial navigation system that communicates position, orientation and velocity of an object — such as an autonomous vehicle or unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) — even when global navigation satellite signals are unavailable.
Learn More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/sensors/hguide-n380-inertialgnss-navigator]]> Synchronizing Velodyne LiDAR
Download our free e-guide, “How to Synchronize a Honeywell HGuide n580 Navigator With a Velodyne HDL-32E or VLP-16 Lidar Unit” to learn more.
Download Now <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/synchronize-hguide-n580-with-velodyne-hdl-32e-vlp-16]]> <[[https://www.geo-week.com/webinars/how-inertial-navigation-and-post-processing-make-surveying]]> Feedback for Improvement HGuide Highlights are designed to keep our customers in-the-know about what we're doing to continually drive value to their business. Let us know if there are topics we're missing or if there's something we can do to improve this communication. Learn more <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/PKCZ2P6]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
